name: Dungeon Skulls
description:
=================================================

you play as a smagic skull that has lost it's body.

now you have to fight through levels to find your body.

=================================================

well, this is my first game and i want to share it to get feedback and ideas. 

there is a lot more to come and if you want to follow the project,

 i sometimes stream on twitch @ https://www.twitch.tv/chillhunt3r

=================================================

Controls

mouse to drag and drop the skull

shoot with left mouse button (unlocked at level 3)

press space to stop mid air.

================================================

No Tutorial On Controls Ingame yet :/

Now It's up to you to start the journy and follow along the development of DUNGEON SKULLS 

===================================================
